name: @texoport/lazy
description: you're lazy, i'm lazy, we're lazy, let's make js lazy

scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: bun run build && bun test && bun run publish:patch
scripts.release:minor: bun run build && bun test && bun run publish:minor
scripts.release:major: bun run build && bun test && bun run publish:major

author: Sai Ashirwad <saiashirwadr@gmail.com>
